review: Great.  Telecasts better than my Comcast cable.  It doesn't seem to allow Amazon Prime programming.  It would be better if it did.
author: Sam

review: I really like it!  It's beats trying to see Netflix on my iPad!
author: Peggy

review: An extremely High quality device with high quality apps and services available for the price its an  amazing value
author: Lawrence

review: I like the Google chromecast  but the only problem with that is only works on YouTube I haven't figured out how to do the rest  so far so good my kids are enjoying watching whatever they used to watch on my phone on the big screen now so yes I do recommend this to everyone
author: labela nur

review: Does not work on all had tvs.  Works great if it is compatible with your TV.
author: D JOHNSON
